name: Break (itch) (RyanSP)
description:
V ubcr vgf abg n cybl gb rfpncr vagreebtngvba...

What do you when your choices lose weight? When you can't even understand your situation?

Because you don't even understand their language.

Be at the helm of a man unable to understand his situation or the language of the people in charge. Stuck in a truly helpless situation.

Break is a visual novel that remembers where you were in your interrogation perpetually until you reach the end. Each individual interrogation session could be started by using the "Start" button and the game if played at a brisk pace could be completed within a minute though it is recommended to take time.
